region: Africa (US-based digital banking for African customers; Nigeria focus)

customers.usage_stats: 50% drop in transaction volume/revenue in Q1 2025 due to compliance focus and high-risk customer removal. Conducted Upwork training for 4,500 people.

team.operation_notes: Resignation and immediate backfill of Front-end Engineer. Moving support from single to double shift. Company offsite in Lagos with all 30+ employees.

product_updates.description: Launched most requested feature: funding and converting Naira to USD.
product_updates.impact: Enable customers to transfer Naira, convert to USD, save in USD or fund USD card.

product_updates.description: Improved liveness check for user onboarding.
product_updates.impact: Ensures improved identity verification regardless of ID.

product_updates.description: OTA deployment for mobile app fixes.
product_updates.impact: No more forced app updates for bug fixes.
Flag high-risk patterns and keywords for USD deposits.
Improves metrics update frequency and reduces AWS costs.

product_updates.description: Integrated PostHog to track app user activity.

events.description: Annual company offsite in Lagos with all 30+ employees.
Completed and passed annual Data Protection Audit for Nigerian entities. Renewed IMTO license.

notes: Q1 focus: compliance and de-risking led to 50% revenue and volume drop (not customer-driven churn). Kicked off partnerships (ALX, 3MTT, Univelcity, Telenvo, Go My Code). Upwork sessions for 4,500 people. Goals for Q2: increase PTO, mid-year bonus program, shift system revamp, launch loyalty program/business accounts, expansion into Ghana, South Africa, and Uganda. Team size at end of Q1: 34. Only 1 resignation, immediately backfilled.
